documents.document: Good habits result from resisting temptation - Proverb
Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose? - Eliza Dushku
It's always too early to quit. - Norman Vincent Peale
Labor gives birth to ideas. - Jim Rohn
All lasting business is built on friendship. - Alfred A. Montapert
"It is not what we get. But who we become, what we contribute... that gives meaning to our lives. - Tony Robins"
Wise are those who learn that the bottom line doesn't always have to be their top priority. - William Arthur Ward
You must be the change you want to see in the world.- Mahatma Gandhi
Living without faith is like driving in a fog. - Proverb
All the flowers of tomorrow are in the seeds of yesterday - Proverb
"Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines. - Robert H. Schuller"
In fair weather prepare for foul. - Thomas Fuller
